exercises: Dynamic Warm‑up: 5 min (jumping jacks, arm circles, leg swings)
Incline Barbell Bench Press 4×8
Dumbbell Arnold Press 3×10
Cable Chest Fly (mid‑level pulley) 3×12
Overhead Triceps Rope Extension 3×12
Cool‑down: 5 min static stretch (pecs, delts, triceps)
Dynamic Warm‑up: 5 min (band pull‑aparts, torso rotations)
Weighted Pull‑Ups 4×6
T‑Bar Row (landmine) 4×8
Single‑Arm Cable Face Pull 3×12 each side
Hammer Curl with Rope attachment 3×10
Cool‑down: 5 min static stretch (lats, rear delts, forearms)
Dynamic Warm‑up: 5 min (bodyweight squats, lunges, high knees)
Barbell Front Squat 4×6
Walking Lunges with Dumbbells 3×12 each leg
Romanian Deadlift 3×8
Box Jumps (24‑inch) 4×5
Cool‑down: 5 min static stretch (quads, hamstrings, glutes)
Dynamic Warm‑up: 5 min (agility ladder – 1‑foot, 2‑foot, lateral)
Agility Ladder Drills (varied patterns) 6 min
Medicine Ball Rotational Throw (oblique focus) 3×8 each side
Hanging Leg Raises 3×12
Plank with Shoulder Tap 3×30 s
Cool‑down: 5 min static stretch (hip flexors, lower back, shoulders)
Dynamic Warm‑up: 5 min (butt kicks, A‑skips, arm swings)
Power Clean 4×4
Dumbbell Push Press 3×6
Kettlebell Swings 4×15
Sprint Intervals – 30 m x 8 (full effort, walk back recovery) 10 min
Cool‑down: 5 min static stretch (full body)
Dynamic Warm‑up: 5 min (gentle jog, arm swings)
Sun Salutation Yoga Flow (5 rounds) 15 min
Hip Flexor Stretch – kneeling, hold 30 s each side 2×
Pigeon Pose – hold 45 s each side 2×
Foam Rolling – quads, IT band, upper back 10 min
Cool‑down: 5 min deep breathing & meditation
Light activity – brisk walk or easy cycling 30‑45 min
Optional: gentle stretching or yoga 10‑15 min

nutrition.daily_calories: ≈2 700 kcal (maintenance + ~300 kcal surplus for muscle gain)
meal_tips: Combine legumes with cereals each meal (e.g., dal with rice or whole‑wheat chapati) to get a complete amino‑acid profile.
Include 30‑40 g of high‑protein dairy per meal – paneer, Greek‑style curd, or soy milk – to boost protein without excess carbs.
Snack on roasted chickpeas, mixed nuts (almonds, walnuts) or a protein shake made with pea‑protein or whey‑isolates (if lacto‑vegetarian).
Add a source of healthy fats (flaxseed oil, avocado, ghee) and vitamin B12 fortified foods to support overall recovery.
